title: REGARDING ACCOMODATION
content:
Seniors any regular food or tiffin services?
 I'll prolly live in a room.

comments.body: Ig hostel mess provides that service
There are a few messes in sutta gully which provide homely food and are easy on the pocket.

To name a few :
1. Siddhartha hotel (near Patel chinappa apartments) - they serve only breakfast and lunch , the best breakfast you can find around 
2. BS home food( in sutta gully) - they serve all 3 meals
3. Channamelleshwara mess( a bit down sutta gully near St. Peters school) - they too serve all 3 meals 

These are veg restaurants for non veg you can try other Devanna hotel and Naveena Beegara Oota which are decent .
Ohh ok, thank you so much for the list!
Now theres a big cafeteria. No problem with food. I'm sure there will be a mess too.
